alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pender, eastern Bladen and northern Brunswick Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Castle Hayne, or 10 miles north of Leland. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Borough, Point Caswell, Currie, Long Creek, Montague and Rooks. This includes Interstate 140 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
